reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress flattering, noting it hugs all the right places and shows off curves, while appreciating its comfortable fit and stretchy material.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GET THIS DRESS!!
items.body: Absolutely stunning! I really wasn't sure it would be long enough because I'm 5'10" 28 weeks pregnant, and 220 lbs., but it goes all the way down resting on the top of my feet. Doesn't drag, the arms are perfect length, and the fabric is stretchy! If youre taller and want the length, do not size down. Will definitely even fit after baby is here. It hugs all the right places and is very comfortable to move around in! It's not see through but you can see lines underneath so it definitely needs an undergarment of some sort! If you're second guessing about this dress, don't be! Get it! You won't regret it! Read more
items.author: Blair W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well, comfortable
items.body: Ribbed material, thicker than expected so it's not see through. Length is good (I'm 5'9" 150lb) fit perfectly. Used for a costume, but I would actually wear to an event. Overall happy! Read more
items.author: Brandon Bourdeau

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Stretchy, and So Comfortable
items.body: I wore this REORIA square neck long dress while 4 months pregnant to a fall wedding and loved it! The fabric is soft and comfy, with plenty of stretch (even as I grow) making it flattering yet comfortable. It’s versatile, you can easily dress it up with heels and jewelry or keep it casual with flats. A great piece that works for different occasions and stages of life. Read more
items.author: Nic

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: This is really cute and so flattering! Material is stretchy and comfy. I bought it for a wedding and was not disappointed!! Read more
items.author: Lacie Woodlee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit like a glove, and good length
items.body: For reference I am 5’8” and ~140lbs, I got a size Medium so I would say it was true to size. Also I always have issues with length being too short, but that was not an issue! Stretchy material and comfortable to wear Read more
items.author: Olivia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So gorgeous
items.body: I got this dress for a last minute date party, it was sunset wedding themed. I got so many compliments and it is so soft and comfortable. I am usually between a XS and Small and get the extra small for a tighter fit. It is so stretchy but beware it shows everything, and for a dress like this I would have gotten a darker color so it was more forgiving if it wasn’t for the theme. Exactly like the picture, and the mermaid style of this dress makes it unique and beautiful. I’m 5’4 and wore 3’ inch heals but could of worn shorter and it would still be the perfect length Read more
items.author: Kacie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It brought sexy back. FR.
items.body: I love this dress. It fits beautifully and showed off curves I didn't realize I had.. for a middle aged woman who has the body shape of the Penguin from the 90's Batman movie, I got my sexy back wearing this bad boy. Seriously. Buy it. 10/10 would recommend. Read more
items.author: Nikki Pepper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will be buying again!
items.body: Such great quality. So comfortable and soft. I am 150-160 lbs, 5,10”. It sat where I wanted it too. I got a size medium. Read more
items.author: Korbyn Gentry

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Rose Red, Khaki, Olive Green, Black, Coffee, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
